name: Gods must be hungry
description:
Gods must be hungry is our entry in the  Ludum Dare 43 Jam. The theme is Sacrifices must be made, so go on and sacrifice!

You are the only one left. You must sacrifice any food you find to the Hungry god, or face his mercilless wrath. Now go. Sacrifices must be made!

Team:

Sebastian - design, sfx, music, art

Ondrej - design, level, ai, code

Pavel - code, art, design

We decided to use Pico-8, the fantasy console with its own environment coded in Lua.

Credits:

Collisions by Zep - link

Screenshake by Doc Robs - link
